title: NaBFID can consider offering credit enhancement, CDS to projects: RBI DG
description: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development (NaBFID) may offer partial credit enhancement and first loss default guarantees to infrastructure companies. This could improve credit ratings and attract long-term investors. NaBFID is also considering offering credit default swaps to boost investor confidence, especially in foreign markets.
